member.name: T:xiApi.NET.DOWNSAMPLING_TYPE
member.summary: Downsampling type, switch between binning and skipping, to be used with the PRM.DOWNSAMPLING_TYPE function parameter.

member.name: F:xiApi.NET.DOWNSAMPLING_TYPE.BINNING
member.summary: Binned type for higher sensitivity.

member.name: F:xiApi.NET.DOWNSAMPLING_TYPE.SKIPPING
member.summary: Skipped type for higher framerates.

member.name: T:xiApi.NET.SHUTTER_TYPE
member.summary: Switch between sensor shutter types, to be used with the PRM.SHUTTER_TYPE function parameter.

member.name: F:xiApi.NET.SHUTTER_TYPE.SHUTTER_GLOBAL
member.summary: Sensor Global Shutter(CMOS sensor).

member.name: F:xiApi.NET.SHUTTER_TYPE.SHUTTER_ROLLING
member.summary: Sensor Electronic Rolling Shutter(CMOS sensor).

member.name: F:xiApi.NET.SHUTTER_TYPE.SHUTTER_GLOBAL_RESET_RELEASE
member.summary: Sensor Global Reset Release Shutter(CMOS sensor).

member.name: T:xiApi.NET.IMG_FORMAT
member.summary: Output image format definitions to be used with the PRM.IMAGE_DATA_FORMAT function parameter.

member.name: F:xiApi.NET.IMG_FORMAT.MONO8
member.summary: Monochrome image with 8 bits per pixel.

member.name: F:xiApi.NET.IMG_FORMAT.MONO16
member.summary: Monochrome image with 16 bits per pixel.

member.name: F:xiApi.NET.IMG_FORMAT.RGB24
member.summary: RGB image data format image with 8 bits per pixel.

member.name: F:xiApi.NET.IMG_FORMAT.RGB32
member.summary: RGBA image data format image with 8 bits per pixel, Alpha values not valid.

member.name: F:xiApi.NET.IMG_FORMAT.RGBPLANAR
member.summary: RGB planar image data format image with 8 bits per pixel.

member.name: F:xiApi.NET.IMG_FORMAT.RAW8
member.summary: 8 bits per pixel raw data from sensor.

member.name: F:xiApi.NET.IMG_FORMAT.RAW16
member.summary: 16 bits per pixel raw data from sensor.

member.name: T:xiApi.NET.IMG_COLOR_FILTER_ARRAY
member.summary: Output image color filter array of RAW images.

member.name: F:xiApi.NET.IMG_COLOR_FILTER_ARRAY.NONE
member.summary: B/W sensors.

member.name: F:xiApi.NET.IMG_COLOR_FILTER_ARRAY.BAYER_RGGB
member.summary: Regular Bayer RGGB readout

member.name: F:xiApi.NET.IMG_COLOR_FILTER_ARRAY.CMYG
member.summary: AK Sony sensors

member.name: F:xiApi.NET.IMG_COLOR_FILTER_ARRAY.RGR
member.summary: 2R+G readout of RGGB sensor

member.name: F:xiApi.NET.IMG_COLOR_FILTER_ARRAY.BAYER_BGGR
member.summary: Bayer BGGR readout

member.name: F:xiApi.NET.IMG_COLOR_FILTER_ARRAY.BAYER_GRBG
member.summary: Bayer GRBG readout

member.name: F:xiApi.NET.IMG_COLOR_FILTER_ARRAY.BAYER_GBRG
member.summary: Bayer GBRG readout

member.name: T:xiApi.NET.BUFF_POLICY
member.summary: Buffer policy settings(can be safe, data will be copied to user/app buffer or unsafe, user will get internally allocated buffer without data copy).

member.name: F:xiApi.NET.BUFF_POLICY.UNSAFE
member.summary: User gets pointer to internally allocated circle buffer and data may be overwritten by device.

member.name: F:xiApi.NET.BUFF_POLICY.SAFE
member.summary: Data from device will be copied to user allocated buffer or xiApi allocated memory.

member.name: T:xiApi.NET.TRG_SOURCE
member.summary: Definitions for camera trigger functionality.

member.name: F:xiApi.NET.TRG_SOURCE.OFF
member.summary: Camera works in free run mode.

member.name: F:xiApi.NET.TRG_SOURCE.EDGE_RISING
member.summary: External trigger (rising edge).

member.name: F:xiApi.NET.TRG_SOURCE.EDGE_FALLING
member.summary: External trigger (falling edge).

member.name: F:xiApi.NET.TRG_SOURCE.SOFTWARE
member.summary: Software(manual) trigger.

member.name: T:xiApi.NET.TRG_SELECTOR
member.summary: Definitions containing information about trigger functionality.

member.name: F:xiApi.NET.TRG_SELECTOR.FRAME_START
member.summary: Selects a trigger starting the capture of one frame.

member.name: F:xiApi.NET.TRG_SELECTOR.EXPOSURE_ACTIVE
member.summary: Selects a trigger controlling the duration of one frame.

member.name: F:xiApi.NET.TRG_SELECTOR.FRAME_BURST_START
member.summary: Selects a trigger starting the capture of the bursts of frames in an acquisition.

member.name: F:xiApi.NET.TRG_SELECTOR.FRAME_BURST_ACTIVE
member.summary: Selects a trigger controlling the duration of the capture of the bursts of frames in an acquisition.

member.name: T:xiApi.NET.ACQ_TIMING_MODE
member.summary: Definitions containing information about acqisition timing modes.

member.name: F:xiApi.NET.ACQ_TIMING_MODE.FREE_RUN
member.summary: Selects a trigger starting the capture of one frame.

member.name: F:xiApi.NET.ACQ_TIMING_MODE.FRAME_RATE
member.summary: Selects a trigger controlling the duration of one frame.

member.name: T:xiApi.NET.GPI_MODE
member.summary: GPI port state options

member.name: F:xiApi.NET.GPI_MODE.OFF
member.summary: Input off.

member.name: F:xiApi.NET.GPI_MODE.TRIGGER
member.summary: Trigger input.

member.name: F:xiApi.NET.GPI_MODE.EXT_EVENT
member.summary: External signal input. It is not implemented yet.

member.name: T:xiApi.NET.GPO_MODE
member.summary: GPO port state options

member.name: F:xiApi.NET.GPO_MODE.OFF
member.summary: Output off.

member.name: F:xiApi.NET.GPO_MODE.ON
member.summary: Logical level.

member.name: F:xiApi.NET.GPO_MODE.FRAME_ACTIVE
member.summary: High during exposure(integration) time + readout time + data transfer time.

member.name: F:xiApi.NET.GPO_MODE.FRAME_ACTIVE_NEG
member.summary: Low during exposure(integration) time + readout time + data trasnfer time.

member.name: F:xiApi.NET.GPO_MODE.EXPOSURE_ACTIVE
member.summary: High during exposure(integration) time.

member.name: F:xiApi.NET.GPO_MODE.EXPOSURE_ACTIVE_NEG
member.summary: Low during exposure(integration) time.

member.name: F:xiApi.NET.GPO_MODE.FRAME_TRIGGER_READY
member.summary: On when sensor is ready for next trigger edge.

member.name: F:xiApi.NET.GPO_MODE.FRAME_TRIGGER_READY_NEG
member.summary: Off when sensor is ready for next trigger edge.

member.name: F:xiApi.NET.GPO_MODE.EXPOSURE_PULSE
member.summary: Short On/Off pulse on start of each exposure.

member.name: F:xiApi.NET.GPO_MODE.EXPOSURE_PULSE_NEG
member.summary: Short Off/On pulse on start of each exposure.

member.name: T:xiApi.NET.LED_MODE
member.summary: Camera LED state options

member.name: F:xiApi.NET.LED_MODE.LED_HEARTBEAT
member.summary: Blink if link is ok (led 1), heartbeat mode (led 2).

member.name: F:xiApi.NET.LED_MODE.LED_TRIGGER_ACTIVE
member.summary: Blink led if trigger detected.

member.name: F:xiApi.NET.LED_MODE.LED_EXT_EVENT_ACTIVE
member.summary: Blink led if external signal detected.

member.name: F:xiApi.NET.LED_MODE.LED_ACQUISITION
member.summary: Blink led during data streaming.

member.name: F:xiApi.NET.LED_MODE.LED_EXPOSURE_ACTIVE
member.summary: Blink led during sensor integration time.

member.name: F:xiApi.NET.LED_MODE.LED_FRAME_ACTIVE
member.summary: Blink if device busy/not busy.

member.name: F:xiApi.NET.LED_MODE.LED_LINK
member.summary: Blink led if link is ok.

member.name: F:xiApi.NET.LED_MODE.LED_OFF
member.summary: Set led to zero.

member.name: F:xiApi.NET.LED_MODE.LED_ON
member.summary: Set led to one.

member.name: T:xiApi.NET.TS_RST_MODE
member.summary: Time stamp reset arming options

member.name: F:xiApi.NET.TS_RST_MODE.TS_RST_ARM_ONCE
member.summary: TimeStamp reset is armed once, after execution engine is disabled.

member.name: F:xiApi.NET.TS_RST_MODE.TS_RST_ARM_PERSIST
member.summary: TimeStamp reset is armed permanently if source is selected.

member.name: T:xiApi.NET.TS_RST_SOURCE
member.summary: possible timestamp reset sources

member.name: F:xiApi.NET.TS_RST_SOURCE.TS_RST_OFF
member.summary: No source selected, timestamp reset effectively disabled.

member.name: F:xiApi.NET.TS_RST_SOURCE.TS_RST_SRC_GPI_1
member.summary: TimeStamp reset source selected GPI1 (after de bounce).

member.name: F:xiApi.NET.TS_RST_SOURCE.TS_RST_SRC_GPI_2
member.summary: TimeStamp reset source selected GPI2 (after de bounce).

member.name: F:xiApi.NET.TS_RST_SOURCE.TS_RST_SRC_GPI_3
member.summary: TimeStamp reset source selected GPI3 (after de bounce).

member.name: F:xiApi.NET.TS_RST_SOURCE.TS_RST_SRC_GPI_4
member.summary: TimeStamp reset source selected GPI4 (after de bounce).

member.name: F:xiApi.NET.TS_RST_SOURCE.TS_RST_SRC_GPI_1_INV
member.summary: TimeStamp reset source selected GPI1 inverted (after de bounce).

member.name: F:xiApi.NET.TS_RST_SOURCE.TS_RST_SRC_GPI_2_INV
member.summary: TimeStamp reset source selected GPI2 inverted (after de bounce).

member.name: F:xiApi.NET.TS_RST_SOURCE.TS_RST_SRC_GPI_3_INV
member.summary: TimeStamp reset source selected GPI3 inverted (after de bounce).

member.name: F:xiApi.NET.TS_RST_SOURCE.TS_RST_SRC_GPI_4_INV
member.summary: TimeStamp reset source selected GPI4 inverted (after de bounce).

member.name: F:xiApi.NET.TS_RST_SOURCE.TS_RST_SRC_GPO_1
member.summary: TimeStamp reset source selected GPO1 (after de bounce).

member.name: F:xiApi.NET.TS_RST_SOURCE.TS_RST_SRC_GPO_2
member.summary: TimeStamp reset source selected GPO2 (after de bounce).

member.name: F:xiApi.NET.TS_RST_SOURCE.TS_RST_SRC_GPO_3
member.summary: TimeStamp reset source selected GPO3 (after de bounce).

member.name: F:xiApi.NET.TS_RST_SOURCE.TS_RST_SRC_GPO_4
member.summary: TimeStamp reset source selected GPO4 (after de bounce).

member.name: F:xiApi.NET.TS_RST_SOURCE.TS_RST_SRC_GPO_1_INV
member.summary: TimeStamp reset source selected GPO1 inverted (after de bounce).

member.name: F:xiApi.NET.TS_RST_SOURCE.TS_RST_SRC_GPO_2_INV
member.summary: TimeStamp reset source selected GPO2 inverted (after de bounce).

member.name: F:xiApi.NET.TS_RST_SOURCE.TS_RST_SRC_GPO_3_INV
member.summary: TimeStamp reset source selected GPO3 inverted (after de bounce).

member.name: F:xiApi.NET.TS_RST_SOURCE.TS_RST_SRC_GPO_4_INV
member.summary: TimeStamp reset source selected GPO4 inverted (after de bounce).

member.name: F:xiApi.NET.TS_RST_SOURCE.TS_RST_SRC_TRIGGER
member.summary: TimeStamp reset source selected TRIGGER (signal for sensor).

member.name: F:xiApi.NET.TS_RST_SOURCE.TS_RST_SRC_TRIGGER_INV
member.summary: TimeStamp reset source selected TRIGGER inverted (signal for sensor).

member.name: F:xiApi.NET.TS_RST_SOURCE.TS_RST_SRC_SW
member.summary: TimeStamp reset source selected software (has immediate effect and is self cleared).

member.name: F:xiApi.NET.TS_RST_SOURCE.TS_RST_SRC_EXPACTIVE
member.summary: TimeStamp reset source selected exposure active.

member.name: F:xiApi.NET.TS_RST_SOURCE.TS_RST_SRC_EXPACTIVE_INV
member.summary: TimeStamp reset source selected exposure active inverted.

member.name: F:xiApi.NET.TS_RST_SOURCE.TS_RST_SRC_FVAL
member.summary: TimeStamp reset source selected frame valid signal from sensor.

member.name: F:xiApi.NET.TS_RST_SOURCE.TS_RST_SRC_FVAL_INV
member.summary: TimeStamp reset source selected frame valid signal from sensor inverted.

member.summary: Warning level.

member.summary: Error level.

member.summary: CMS enable.

member.name: F:xiApi.NET.CMS_MODE.EN_FAST
member.summary: CMS enable(fast).

member.name: T:xiApi.NET.PRM
member.summary: Parameters available for set/get operations.

member.name: F:xiApi.NET.PRM.DEVICE_NAME
member.summary: Get camera model name. Type string.
member.remarks: xiCam.GetParam(PRM.DEVICE_NAME, out string val);

member.name: F:xiApi.NET.PRM.DEVICE_TYPE
member.summary: Returns device type (1394, USB2.0, CURRERAâ€¦..). Type string.
member.remarks: xiCam.GetParam(PRM.DEVICE_TYPE, out string val)

member.name: F:xiApi.NET.PRM.DEVICE_MODEL_ID
member.summary: Returns device model id . Type int.
member.remarks: xiCam.GetParam(PRM.DEVICE_MODEL_ID, out int val)

member.name: F:xiApi.NET.PRM.DEBUG_LEVEL
member.summary: Set the amount of debug prints to be reported from dll. Type int. Use DEBUG_LEVEL class to set parameter.
member.remarks: xiCam.SetParam(PRM.DEBUG_LEVEL, out string val)

member.name: F:xiApi.NET.PRM.DEVICE_INSTANCE_PATH
member.summary: Return device system instance path.
member.remarks: xiCam.GetParam(PRM.DEVICE_INSTANCE_PATH, string val)

member.name: F:xiApi.NET.PRM.DEVICE_USER_ID
member.summary: Set/Get custom device ID string. Type string.
member.remarks: xiCam.GetParam(PRM.DEVICE_USER_ID, string val)

member.name: F:xiApi.NET.PRM.AUTO_BANDWIDTH_CALCULATION
member.summary: Enable/disable automatic bus speed adjusting on device init. Type int.
member.remarks: xiCam.SetParam(PRM.AUTO_BANDWIDTH_CALCULATION, int val)

member.name: F:xiApi.NET.PRM.DEVICE_SN
member.summary: Returns device serial number in decimal format. Type string, int, float.
member.remarks: xiCam.GetParam(PRM.DEVICE_SN, out string val)

member.name: F:xiApi.NET.PRM.DEVICE_SENS_SN
member.summary: Returns sensor serial number in decimal format. Type string
member.remarks: xiCam.GetParam(DEVICE_SENS_SN, out string val)

member.name: F:xiApi.NET.PRM.EXPOSURE
member.summary: Set/Get exposure time in microseconds. Type int.
member.remarks: xiCam.GetParam(PRM.EXPOSURE, out int val) or xiCam.SetParam(PRM.EXPOSURE, int val)

member.name: F:xiApi.NET.PRM.EXPOSURE_DIRECT_UPDATE
member.summary: Set exposure time in microseconds with direct update flag to be applied immediately. Type int.
member.remarks: xiCam.SetParam(PRM.EXPOSURE, int val)

member.name: F:xiApi.NET.PRM.EXPOSURE_MAX
member.summary: Get longest possible exposure to be set on camera. Type int.
member.remarks: xiCam.GetParam(PRM.EXPOSURE_MAX, out int val)

member.name: F:xiApi.NET.PRM.EXPOSURE_MIN
member.summary: Get shortest possible exposure to be set on camera. Type int.
member.remarks: xiCam.GetParam(PRM.EXPOSURE_MIN, out int val)

member.name: F:xiApi.NET.PRM.GAIN
member.summary: Set/Get camera gain in dB. Type float.
member.remarks: xiCam.GetParam(PRM.GAIN, out float val) or xiCam.SetParam(PRM.GAIN, float val)

member.name: F:xiApi.NET.PRM.GAIN_DIRECT_UPDATE
member.summary: Set camera gain in dB with direct update flag to be applied immediately. Type float.
member.remarks: xiCam.SetParam(PRM.GAIN, float val)

member.name: F:xiApi.NET.PRM.GAIN_MAX
member.summary: Get highest possible camera gain in dB. Type float.
member.remarks: xiCam.GetParam(PRM.GAIN_MAX, out float val)

member.name: F:xiApi.NET.PRM.GAIN_MIN
member.summary: Get lowest possible camera gain in dB. Type float.
member.remarks: xiCam.GetParam(PRM.GAIN_MIN, out float val)

member.name: F:xiApi.NET.PRM.DOWNSAMPLING
member.summary: Set/Get image resolution by binning or skipping. Type int.
member.remarks: xiCam.GetParam(PRM.DOWNSAMPLING, out int val) or xiCam.SetParam(PRM.DOWNSAMPLING, int val)

member.name: F:xiApi.NET.PRM.DOWNSAMPLING_MAX
member.summary: Get highest value for binning or skipping. Type int.
member.remarks: xiCam.GetParam(PRM.DOWNSAMPLING_MAX, out int val)

member.name: F:xiApi.NET.PRM.DOWNSAMPLING_MIN
member.summary: Get lowest value for binning or skipping. Type int.
member.remarks: xiCam.GetParam(PRM.DOWNSAMPLING_MIN, out int val)

member.name: F:xiApi.NET.PRM.DOWNSAMPLING_TYPE
member.summary: Change image downsampling type. Type int.
member.remarks: xiCam.GetParam(PRM.DOWNSAMPLING_TYPE, out int val) xiCam.SetParam(PRM.DOWNSAMPLING_TYPE, out int val)

member.name: F:xiApi.NET.PRM.SHUTTER_TYPE
member.summary: Change sensor shutter type(CMOS sensor). Use class SHUTTER_TYPE to set value. Type int.
member.remarks: xiCam.GetParam(PRM.SHUTTER_TYPE, out int val) xiCam.SetParam(PRM.SHUTTER_TYPE, out int val)

member.name: F:xiApi.NET.PRM.IMAGE_DATA_FORMAT
member.summary: Set/Get output image data format. Use class IMG_FORMAT to set value. Type int.
member.remarks: xiCam.GetParam(PRM.IMAGE_DATA_FORMAT, out int val) or xiCam.SetParam(PRM.IMAGE_DATA_FORMAT, int val)

member.name: F:xiApi.NET.PRM.IMAGE_PAYLOAD_SIZE
member.summary: Current format of pixels on transport layer. Type int.
member.remarks: xiCam.GetParam(PRM.TRANSPORT_PIXEL_FORMAT, out int val) or xiCam.SetParam(PRM.TRANSPORT_PIXEL_FORMAT, int val)

member.name: F:xiApi.NET.PRM.TRANSPORT_PIXEL_FORMAT
member.summary: Buffer size in bytes sufficient for output image returned GetImage. Type int.
member.remarks: xiCam.GetParam(PRM.IMAGE_PAYLOAD_SIZE, out int val)

member.name: F:xiApi.NET.PRM.SENSOR_TAPS
member.summary: Set/Get number of sensor taps. Supported only by MD camera family. Type int.
member.remarks: xiCam.GetParam(PRM.SENSOR_TAPS, out int val) or xiCam.SetParam(PRM.SENSOR_TAPS, int val)

member.name: F:xiApi.NET.PRM.SENSOR_PIXEL_CLOCK_FREQ_HZ
member.summary: Set/Get ensor pixel clock frequency in Hz. Type int.
member.remarks: xiCam.GetParam(PRM.SENSOR_PIXEL_CLOCK_FREQ_HZ, out int val) or xiCam.SetParam(PRM.SENSOR_PIXEL_CLOCK_FREQ_HZ, int val)

member.name: F:xiApi.NET.PRM.SENSOR_PIXEL_CLOCK_FREQ_INDEX
member.summary: Sensor pixel clock frequency. Selects frequency index for getter of XI_PRM_SENSOR_PIXEL_CLOCK_FREQ_HZ parameter. Type int.
member.remarks: xiCam.GetParam(PRM.SENSOR_PIXEL_CLOCK_FREQ_INDEX, out int val) or xiCam.SetParam(PRM.SENSOR_PIXEL_CLOCK_FREQ_INDEX, int val)

member.name: F:xiApi.NET.PRM.SENSOR_DATA_BIT_DEPTH
member.summary: Set/Get sensor output data bit depth. Type int.
member.remarks: xiCam.GetParam(PRM.SENSOR_DATA_BIT_DEPTH, out int val) or xiCam.SetParam(PRM.SENSOR_DATA_BIT_DEPTH, int val)

member.name: F:xiApi.NET.PRM.OUTPUT_DATA_BIT_DEPTH
member.summary: Set/Get device output data bit depth. Type int.
member.remarks: xiCam.GetParam(PRM.OUTPUT_DATA_BIT_DEPTH, out int val) or xiCam.SetParam(PRM.OUTPUT_DATA_BIT_DEPTH, int val)

member.name: F:xiApi.NET.PRM.OUTPUT_DATA_PACKING
member.summary: Set/Get Device output data packing (or grouping) enabled. Packing could be enabled if output_data_bit_depth > 8 and packing is available. Type int.
member.remarks: xiCam.GetParam(PRM.OUTPUT_DATA_PACKING, out int val) or xiCam.SetParam(PRM.OUTPUT_DATA_PACKING, int val)

member.name: F:xiApi.NET.PRM.IMAGE_IS_COLOR
member.summary: Returns 1 for color cameras. By default -. Type Int.
member.remarks: xiCam.GetParam(PRM.IMAGE_IS_COLOR, out int val) or xiCam.SetParam(PRM.IMAGE_IS_COLOR, int val)

member.name: F:xiApi.NET.PRM.COLOR_FILTER_ARRAY
member.summary: Returns color filter array type of RAW data. By default -. Type Int.
member.remarks: xiCam.GetParam(PRM.COLOR_FILTER_ARRAY, out int val) or xiCam.SetParam(PRM.COLOR_FILTER_ARRAY, int val)

member.name: F:xiApi.NET.PRM.FRAMERATE
member.summary: Get frames per second. Type float.
member.remarks: xiCam.GetParam(PRM.FRAMERATE, out float val)

member.name: F:xiApi.NET.PRM.FRAMERATE_MAX
member.summary: Get highest possible framerate for current camera settings. Type float.
member.remarks: xiCam.GetParam(PRM.FRAMERATE_MAX, out float val)

member.name: F:xiApi.NET.PRM.FRAMERATE_MIN
member.summary: Get lowest framerate for current camera settings. Type float.
member.remarks: xiCam.GetParam(PRM.FRAMERATE_MIN, out float val)

member.name: F:xiApi.NET.PRM.ACQ_TIMING_MODE
member.summary: Type of sensor frames timing. Use ACQ_TIMING_MODE class to set/get values. Type int.
member.remarks: xiCam.SetParam(PRM.ACQ_TIMING_MODE, float val) xiCam.GetParam(PRM.ACQ_TIMING_MODE, out float val)

member.name: F:xiApi.NET.PRM.AVAILABLE_BANDWIDTH_MIN
member.summary: Get lowest bandwidth for current camera settings. Type int.
member.remarks: xiCam.GetParam(PRM.AVAILABLE_BANDWIDTH_MIN, int val)

member.name: F:xiApi.NET.PRM.LIMIT_BANDWIDTH_MAX
member.summary: Get highest possible bandwidth for current camera settings. Type int.
member.remarks: xiCam.GetParam(PRM.AVAILABLE_BANDWIDTH_MAX, int val)

member.name: F:xiApi.NET.PRM.LIMIT_BANDWIDTH_MIN
member.summary: Get lowest bandwidth for current camera settings. Type int.
member.remarks: xiCam.GetParam(PRM.AVAILABLE_BANDWIDTH_MIN, int val)

member.name: F:xiApi.NET.PRM.OFFSET_X
member.summary: Set/Get horizontal offset from the origin to the area of interest (in pixels). Type int.

member.summary: Set/Get width of the image provided by the camera (in pixels). Type int.

member.name: F:xiApi.NET.PRM.WIDTH_MIN

member.name: F:xiApi.NET.PRM.HEIGHT_MIN

member.remarks: xiCam.GetParam(PRM.HEIGHT_MIN, out int val)

member.name: F:xiApi.NET.PRM.LUT_EN
member.summary: Activates look up table. Currently available only for Currera-R cameras.

member.name: F:xiApi.NET.PRM.LUT_INDEX

member.summary: Get highest LUT index (offset) of the coefficient to access in the LUT. Type int.
member.remarks: xiCam.GetParam(PRM.LUT_INDEX_MAX, out int val)

member.name: F:xiApi.NET.PRM.LUT_INDEX_MIN
member.summary: Get lowest LUT index (offset) of the coefficient to access in the LUT. Type int.
member.remarks: xiCam.GetParam(PRM.LUT_INDEX_MIN, out int val)

member.name: F:xiApi.NET.PRM.LUT_VALUE
member.summary: Set/Get value at entry LUTIndex of the LUT. Type int.
member.remarks: xiCam.GetParam(PRM.LUT_VALUE, out int val) or xiCam.SetParam(PRM.LUT_VALUE, int val)

member.name: F:xiApi.NET.PRM.LUT_VALUE_MAX

member.name: F:xiApi.NET.PRM.LUT_VALUE_MIN

member.remarks: xiCam.GetParam(PRM.LUT_VALUE_MIN, out int val)

member.name: F:xiApi.NET.PRM.TRG_SOURCE
member.summary: Set/Get source of trigger. Use TRG_SOURCE class to set parameter. Type int.
member.remarks: xiCam.GetParam(PRM.TRG_SOURCE, out int val) or xiCam.SetParam(PRM.TRG_SOURCE, int val)

member.name: F:xiApi.NET.PRM.TRG_SELECTOR
member.summary: Set/Get type of trigger. Use TRG_SELECTOR class to set parameter. Type int.
member.remarks: xiCam.GetParam(PRM.TRG_SELECTOR, out int val) or xiCam.SetParam(PRM.TRG_SELECTOR, int val)

member.name: F:xiApi.NET.PRM.TRG_SOFTWARE
member.summary: Set an internal software trigger. PRM.TRG_SOURCE must be set to TRG_SOFTWARE. Type int.
member.remarks: xiCam.SetParam(PRM.TRG_SOFTWARE, int val)

member.name: F:xiApi.NET.PRM.TRG_DELAY
member.summary: Specifies the delay in microseconds (us) to apply after the trigger reception before activating it. Type int.
member.remarks: xiCam.GetParam(PRM.TRG_DELAY, out int val) xiCam.SetParam(PRM.TRG_DELAY, int val)

member.name: F:xiApi.NET.PRM.TS_RST_MODE

member.name: F:xiApi.NET.PRM.TS_RST_SOURCE
member.summary: Defines which source will be used for timestamp reset. Writing this parameter will trigger settings of engine (arming) Use TS_RST_SOURCE class to set parameter. Type int.
member.remarks: xiCam.GetParam(PRM.TS_RST_SOURCE, out int val) or xiCam.SetParam(PRM.TS_RST_SOURCE, int val)

member.name: F:xiApi.NET.PRM.ACQ_FRAME_BURST_COUNT

member.summary: Automatic exposure/gain ROI Height. Type integer.

member.name: F:xiApi.NET.PRM.BPC
member.summary: Enable correction of bad pixels. By default 0(disabled). Type integer.

member.name: F:xiApi.NET.PRM.DEBOUNCE_EN

member.remarks: xiCam.SetParam(PRM.DEBOUNCE_EN, int val); xiCam.GetParam(PRM.DEBOUNCE_EN, out int val);

member.name: F:xiApi.NET.PRM.DEBOUNCE_T0
member.summary: Debounce time (x * 10us). Type integer.

member.name: F:xiApi.NET.PRM.DEBOUNCE_T1
member.summary: Debounce time (x * 10us). Type integer.
member.remarks: xiCam.SetParam(PRM.DEBOUNCE_T1, int val); xiCam.GetParam(PRM.DEBOUNCE_T1, out int val);

member.name: F:xiApi.NET.PRM.DEBOUNCE_POL
member.summary: Debounce polarity (pol = 1 t0 - falling edge, t1 - rising edge). By default 0(disabled). Type integer.
member.remarks: xiCam.SetParam(PRM.DEBOUNCE_POL, int val); xiCam.GetParam(PRM.DEBOUNCE_POL, out int val);

member.summary: Returns 1 for cameras that support cooling.

member.name: F:xiApi.NET.PRM.COOLING
member.summary: Start camera cooling. By default 0. Type integer.

member.name: F:xiApi.NET.PRM.TARGET_TEMP

member.remarks: xiCam.SetParam(PRM.TARGET_TEMP, float val); xiCam.GetParam(PRM.TARGET_TEMP, out float val);

member.name: F:xiApi.NET.PRM.CHIP_TEMP

member.name: F:xiApi.NET.PRM.SENSOR_MODE
member.summary: Current sensor mode. Allows to select sensor mode by one integer. Setting of this parameter affects: image dimensions and downsampling.. Type integer.

member.name: F:xiApi.NET.PRM.HDR

member.name: F:xiApi.NET.PRM.HDR_T1
member.summary: Enable High Dynamic Range feature. By default 0(disabled). Type integer.
member.remarks: xiCam.SetParam(PRM.HDR_T1, int val); xiCam.GetParam(PRM.HDR_T1, out int val);

member.name: F:xiApi.NET.PRM.HDR_T2

member.remarks: xiCam.SetParam(PRM.HDR_T2, int val); xiCam.GetParam(PRM.HDR_T2, out int val);

member.name: F:xiApi.NET.PRM.KNEEPOINT1

member.name: F:xiApi.NET.PRM.KNEEPOINT2

member.remarks: xiCam.SetParam(PRM.IMAGE_BLACK_LEVEL, int val); xiCam.GetParam(PRM.IMAGE_BLACK_LEVEL, out int val);

member.name: F:xiApi.NET.PRM.API_VERSION
